welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Takeocho-takeo, Japan! Immerse yourself in the city's rich history, traditional hot springs, and serene countryside. We invite you to explore and experience the charm of our beautiful city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Saga Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nagasaki Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Nagasaki Airport handles flights to and from other cities within Japan.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Nagasaki Airport serves flights to and from other countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
